isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - VEHICLE INTERFACE RELAYS

svcproc.title: VEHICLE INTERFACE RELAYS
svcproc.para: The vehicle interface relays and ignition and battery power fuses protect the WTEC III Electronic Control System. The vehicle cab (or platform) harness and engine harness have connections to the transmission harness, which is connected to the interface relays, the ECU and to the Allison WT transmission.
